name: snake.club - Mastodon
description:
Welcome to üêç.club! This is a friends-only Mastodon server hosted by Stephen (@brenns10). You're probably here because some dude named Stephen told you that Elon Musk sucks and you should get a Mastodon account. Please be nice while you're here, don't be spammy, and we'll get along great.

(Please note that we are not in any way affiliated with any NFT going by a similar name to this domain.)
